com.orange.links.client.shapes
Interface Drawable

All Known Subinterfaces:
Connection, Shape
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractConnection, AbstractShape, DecorationShape, DrawableSet, FunctionShape, MouseShape, MovablePoint, Point, StraightArrowConnection, StraightConnection
public interface Drawable

Common interface for all shapes and connections.

allowSynchronized

void allowSynchronized(boolean allowSynchronized)
Whether or not a Drawable can be set as Synchronized per setSynchronized. E.g., a Connection sets itself as synced after draw. If it is connected to a shape being dragged, we don't want to allow it to sync itself.

Parameters:
allowSynchronized - whether or not the Drawable should allow itself to be set as synchronized.
